languages.text: "Гадостный шут, что волчья блоха. И столь же верткий. Одного в толк не возьму: почто его кормят при дворе? Не за язык же поганый…"

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Гадостный, что волчья блоха. И столь же верткий. Одного в толк не возьму: почто его кормят при дворе? Не за язык же поганый…"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."
languages.original_text: "Гадостный шут, что волчья блоха. И столь же верткий. Одного в толк не возьму: почто его кормят при дворе? Не за язык же поганый…"

"That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

languages.text: "Dieser Possenreißer macht einen wahnsinnig wie eine Wolfslaus und ist ebenso schnell. Ich verstehe nicht, warum er am Gouverneurshof durchgefüttert wird. An seiner bösen Zunge kann es nicht liegen ..."
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Possenreißer macht einen wahnsinnig wie eine Wolfslaus und ist ebenso schnell. Ich verstehe nicht, warum er am Gouverneurshof durchgefüttert wird. An seiner bösen Zunge kann es nicht liegen ..."

languages.text: « Ce bouffon est aussi agaçant qu'une puce dans le pelage d'un loup... et tout aussi insaisissable. Pourquoi fait-il partie de la cour du gouverneur ? J'imagine que ce n'est pas grâce à sa maudite langue... »
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce bouffon est aussi agaçant qu'une puce dans le pelage d'un loup... et tout aussi insaisissable. Pourquoi fait-il partie de la cour du gouverneur ? J'imagine que ce n'est pas grâce à sa maudite langue... »

languages.text: “那个小丑就像狼疮一样狡猾，让人发疯。那些人为什么允许他留在总督的宫廷里？肯定不是因为他那条欠割的舌头……”
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

traits.locale_text: “那个小丑就像狼疮一样狡猾，让人发疯。那些人为什么允许他留在总督的宫廷里？肯定不是因为他那条欠割的舌头……”

languages.text: «Ese bufón es tan irritante como un piojo de lobo, e igual de escurridizo. ¿Por qué le permiten alimentarse de la corte del gobernador? No puede deberse a su sucia lengua...».
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

traits.locale_text: «Ese bufón es tan irritante como un piojo de lobo, e igual de escurridizo. ¿Por qué le permiten alimentarse de la corte del gobernador? No puede deberse a su sucia lengua...».

languages.text: 「あの道化はオオカミシラミのように人をイライラさせて、しかも同じくらいずる賢い。総督の側近どもはなぜあいつを野放しにしているんだ？あの汚らわしい口が理由なわけじゃないだろうが…」
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."

traits.locale_text: 「あの道化はオオカミシラミのように人をイライラさせて、しかも同じくらいずる賢い。総督の側近どもはなぜあいつを野放しにしているんだ？あの汚らわしい口が理由なわけじゃないだろうが…」

languages.text: "O aptal, bir kurt biti kadar çıldırtıcı ve bir o kadar da sinsi. Neden vali sarayından beslenmesine izin veriyorlar ki? Kesinlikle pis dili yüzünden değildir..."
languages.original_text: "That buffoon is as maddening as a wolf louse, and just as slippery. Why do they let him feed off the governor's court? Not for his foul tongue, surely..."
